summary: Nazareth is a city in Israel with a rich history and religious importance. It is known as the hometown of Jesus, who is central to Christianity and Islam. The city has been inhabited since prehistoric times and was once a Jewish village. Today, it is the largest city in the Northern District of Israel, with a population of over 78,000 people, mostly Arab citizens. Nazareth attracts many Christian pilgrims due to its biblical connections, especially the Church of the Annunciation, which is one of the largest Christian worship sites in the Middle East.
title: Nazareth
